problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I was surprised when there were two repair specialists, Shannon Schneider and Juana Hernandez, who showed up to change the lightbulbs in my bedroom. It isn't a two person job. Shannon Schneider did everything, and Juana Hernandez just watched and messed around on their phone.
Question: Who was lazy and just watched the other person do the work?
ans0: Shannon Schneider
ans1: Not enough info
ans2: Juana Hernandez
